author: National Bureau
text:
We have been targeted since we were in power, says Sonia Gandhi.

A day after the former Home Minister P. Chidambaram came under fire from the BJP over changes made to the UPA government’s initial Ishrat Jehan affidavit, he found support from Congress chief Sonia Gandhi.

“Chidambaram has already explained. We have been targeted since we were in power,” Ms. Gandhi said when asked to respond to the BJP’s allegations that the former Home Minister rewrote an affidavit on Ishrat Jehan for political reasons.

The BJP submitted notice to take up the issue in both the Houses after Prime Minister Narendra Modi discussed the matter with his Ministers.

Congress leader Digvijaya Singh defended Mr. Chidambaram, saying former Home Secretary G.K. Pillai, who has alleged interference by Mr. Chidambaram, was now working for industrialist Gautam Adani.
title: Sonia defends party leader
